patterns: bottie give me some fun facts
can you tell me a fun fact
bottie tell me a fun fact
responses: Fun Fact: There are currently 42 species of dolphins and seven species of porpoises.
Fun Fact: Three dogs survived the Titanic sinking
Fun Fact: Bananas are curved because they grow towards the sun.
Fun Fact: Most Korean people don’t have armpit odor.
Fun Fact: The original London Bridge is now in Arizona.
Fun Fact: During your lifetime, you will produce enough saliva to fill two swimming pools.
Fun Fact: Car manufacturer Volkswagen makes sausages.
Fun Fact: Only 5% of the ocean has been explored.
Fun Fact: The top six foods that make your fart are beans, corn, bell peppers, cauliflower, cabbage and milk.

patterns: Can you tell me a joke bottie?
Do you have any jokes Bottie?
Can you tell me a joke
responses: I ate a clock yesterday, it was very time-consuming.
Have you played the updated kids' game? I Spy With My Little Eye . . . Phone.
A perfectionist walked into a bar...apparently, the bar wasn’t set high enough.
The world tongue-twister champion just got arrested. I hear they're gonna give him a really tough sentence.
Did you hear about the semi-colon that broke the law? He was given two consecutive sentences.
I've just written a song about tortillas; actually, it’s more of a rap.
I woke up this morning and forgot which side the sun rises from, then it dawned on me.

patterns: Tell me a good joke Bottie
tell me a good joke bottie
Do you have any good jokes?
Do you have any good jokes Bottie?
responses: Relationships are a lot like algebra. Have you ever looked at your X and wondered Y?
Intelligence is like an underwear. It is important that you have it, but not necessary that you show it off.
Don't spell part backwards. It's a trap.
I wasn't originally going to get a brain transplant, but then I changed my mind.
I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down.
